website_summaries.verdict: Offers mess-free pitting of up to 4 cherries at once. Entire tool may be cleaned in a dishwasher.
pros: Pitter has a non-skid base to prevent slippage
Will help you work through many cherries quickly
Collection area prevents juices from splattering and staining your kitchen and clothing
cons: Larger unit than some other pitters
May not fully remove some pits

customer_reviews.title: One of the few single function kitchen tools that is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Used for a couple years now to get prepare cherries for snacking. I've had a 99% success rate with removing pits. The failed cherries are pretty easy to ID since there is no "exit wound," just a cross from where the mechanism missed the pit. It has not stained when washed off with water after use. Ended up giving some as gifts after I positive feedback on a the bowls of cherries I brought to a few playdates. I'm do not like single function kitchen tools, but this and the OXO strawberry huller (link below) are 2 tools that just work and really save time.
customer_reviews.author: sloebrake

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly, watch for pits even after using the pitter.....
customer_reviews.text: I went to a cherry picking farm and picked up about 5 lbs of cherries. I knew we couldn't eat in time before they went bad so I bought this to take the pits out of the remaining couple lbs to freeze them for protein shakes. Well it cracked the plastic at the end of the batch and laterwhen I made protein shakes, I noticed there will still pits in some of them 😒 I think they are not made for heavy use. I did about 2lbs of cherries but wasn't happy that it broke and didn't even get all the pits out. So basically it went in the trash and I won't be buying another!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Examen

customer_reviews.title: Great little product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just tried this out and I'm very pleased. Great little gizmo for such a reasonable price. It didn't take long to pit 3 pounds of cherries. Easy to use, simple, logical design. A couple of key things: 1. check the cherries as you take them out. Sometimes the pits are hanging on to the cherry but easy to remove and 2. wash the pitter immediately after you finish using it or it will be hard to get the juice and fibers out from between the top and the white interior "plate" that covers the "plungers." I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny B

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I've pitted about 8 lbs of cherries with this so far, and the last batch worked as well as the first. If you line up all four cherries' stem ends (minus the stem of course) directly upright in the little cups, and give it a good whack, maybe one pit in 50 won't come out perfectly. Good enough for me! It's not built for the ages (plastic, and those cutting tines are going to get dull eventually), but ah well. It's also a little bulky in the drawer. Nothing frustrating, just a bit more drawer real estate required than those scissor-action, one-cherry-at-a-time units.
customer_reviews.author: RicketyFence

customer_reviews.title: Compact, tidy, easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice to be able to do 4 at once instead of 1 at a time, and the pit-catcher contains most of the mess and is big enough to not need to be emptied all the time. The action is smooth, it doesn't mash the cherries, and it cleans up easily. It's also compact enough to not feel like annoying clutter for the large part of the year when cherries aren't in season.
customer_reviews.author: PaigeG

customer_reviews.title: Faster than one at a time
customer_reviews.text: I work in kitchens for a living and love cherries but hate pitting them. You will occasionally have to pull a pit that didn't quite come out of the cherry all the way. I would say 1 out of every 5 or 6 cherries this will happen. No biggy for me. The plastic used to make this utensil is not very heavy and I am a little easier on it than heavy duty plastic utensils. I have pitted hundreds of cherries with this and it still is going strong.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, but hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I recently processed about 10 pounds of cherries, and this made much faster work of that than any other method I've tried. So the good news is it works exactly as you'd expect. It doesn't matter if you put the cherries in with the stem side up, or if you put them in sideways, it will still work. I also like that there are large and small holes for the little tray thing. The only downside to this is that it is quite hard to clean. I ran it through the dishwasher on the top rack, and it was the only thing in the whole load that didn't get clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Fehrman

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm even though it's plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean, and it does olives too! WARNING - Like all pitters, verify that 4 pits drop through into the catch tray. About 1:10 will remain hanging by the cherry skin. The catch tray make it easy to count pits.
customer_reviews.author: Blowfish

customer_reviews.title: great product, 4 cherries at once
customer_reviews.text: This does four cherries at once. I have three kids using this, and its been used a lot, and never has had an issue. I love this. There are two sizes for smaller, or larger cherries. It locks, so when not in use you won't get cut. My three year old can use this with some help. They would not eat cherries before, now they love them!
customer_reviews.author: mkiiii

customer_reviews.title: Progressive Cherry -It Cherry Pitter
customer_reviews.text: I Love everything about this cherry pitter..........It works like a charm and so easy to use and clean! I love the fact that the plastic holder has two sizes--each with 4 slots--the larger one for the cherries and the smaller one on the opposite end for pitting olives. You can pit cherries for a cherry pie in less than 15 minutes!!! I would highly recommend this cherry pitter because it is so versatile!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peppy

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Just came yesterday and I used it last night. Made quick work of 6 pounds of cherries. I wanted to make a homemade cherry pie as cherries are currently in season and a great buy. But after I bought them, I thought how do I pit all of these cherries and then I looked on Amazon and found this unit and in two days I had it and it works great. Easy clean up too. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Scientist

customer_reviews.title: Great then cracked ugh
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say that I was in love with this cherry pitter. I had been using a single cherry pitter and every night I would get cherry juice all over the place. So I decided to get this with high hopes. It was amazing! I'm on a specific type of diet and it allows me to pit 12 cherries within a minute to add to my yogurt as my evening snack. And there's absolutely no mess. Then all of a sudden tonight about a month after getting it it cracked. I was so upset. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Naokigirl

customer_reviews.title: BEST INVENTION EVER
customer_reviews.text: Why oh why did I wait so long to shell out the $10 for this gadget?! As one who eats gallons of cherries every summer, this will save me so much hassle, and now I can supply them to both my 7 and 4yr olds without the mess or aggravation of wasted cherry flesh. The device is so easy and efficient, even my 4yr old could use it to pit cherries!
customer_reviews.author: abcmom12

customer_reviews.title: A Kitchen Staple Now
customer_reviews.text: I love using this cherry pitter. It is sturdy, easy to use, and effective. I prep cherries for my toddler son with it and it has made giving him cherries a breeze. So glad I got one that does four at once. It has been a great purchase. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: apet25

customer_reviews.title: great litle machine
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old granddaughter, loves cherries, this being cherry season, and all, she eats them by the pound. Pitting them for her is a messy chore, not to mention time consuming. This thing pits 4 cherries at a time in a few seconds, no mess. Who knew I needed one of these, I recommend if you have little ones that love cherries
customer_reviews.author: CECILIA DOWNES

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for pitting multiple cherries at one time
customer_reviews.text: Great cherry pitter. There are 8 spots to set the cherries - 4 small and 4 large. So pick the size of cherry you want to pit, put in 4 cherries, close the lid, then open the lid and the cherries are pitted. The pits go into the tray underneath with any bit of juice. Dump as it gets full. Quite easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: Guitar Youngster

customer_reviews.title: Got Cherries?You Need This Tool!
customer_reviews.text: Works well.Very well made tool for taking out the pits.Have only used on cherries,but ripe olives will pit just as easily,I feel sure.Arrived promptly and takes care of the boring,time consuming job in no time.At this price it cannot be beat!Way faster than any of the single cherry pit removers on the market.Only pits 4 at a time,but built more sturdy than the 6 at a time ones that are similar.Buy it! you will be glad you did1
customer_reviews.author: James Cook

customer_reviews.title: I kinda like it!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how well this works. I almost never buy single use items...but pitting cherries is no fun. It has missed a couple of pits, but you could tell immediately when it did as there were no exit holes. It was fast and easy. Overall it does what I need.
customer_reviews.author: GPetty

customer_reviews.title: YES! Makes a tedious job Simpler, Faster!
customer_reviews.text: Feeling lucky as this is the 2nd kitchen gadget I bought this summer that Actually Works with minimal fuss. Cleans easily witha swish of warm soapy water (I wouldn’t bother putting this in the dishwasher, myself), and let it air dry a bit before storing it in its own box or a zip bag. Pitted lots of bing cherries fast (which I chopped up for homemade cherry vanilla ice cream)! Some gadgets require more fussing/ cleaning etc than they’re worth.
customer_reviews.author: LadyG

customer_reviews.title: Great way to pit 4 cherries at once
customer_reviews.text: I love fresh cherries. And what better way to eat them than without their pit. This is a great way to de-pit them quickly with little clean up. I even did a bunch of cherries to freeze for later use Makes quick work out of a necessary chore
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Depends on what the cherries are being used for
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to tear up the cherries more than a hand-held single cherry pitter and I found myself always having to count the pits in the tray to make sure it got them all, which it often didn't. If you're making a pie or something like that, no big deal. But I was making brandied cherries and wanted them to look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Astute Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This cherry pitter is very convenient for me and makes cherries a delightful snack. If I was going to cook cherries, I'd get a bigger one, but I just needed if for pitting cherries to add to fruit salad. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this cherry pitter. I put it off for a few years and that was a mistake. My son eats tons of cherries during cherry season but wastes so much fruit if I don’t get that pit out. This gets it out really clean and zero waste. Good quality and easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gallen024

customer_reviews.title: Great Time Saver!
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid product - Looks like it will last. It works great - Simple to use. No doubt it will be a time saver. Curiously, even though it doesn't mention anything about olives, it appears to handle them as well. If you reverse the tray there are four (4) smaller holes and the only thing we can think they are for is olives.
customer_reviews.author: Bali Hai Batman

customer_reviews.title: Best High Quality Cherry Pitter Ever
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Much better than I anticipated. Very well made. I’m a stickler for quality and this is made with quality in mind. When u think of putting 4 cherries at a time it doesn’t seem like much but it goes fast and the outcome is near perfect. No biting down on pits and breaking your terth😳. Take my word as a prolific Amazon buyer: this is the best choice. And you can’t beat the price. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: SoloTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, solid...
customer_reviews.text: This device was great, a huge time saver, hit the mark every time, I do wonder about washing it since no dishwasher, but it shouldn't be that bad... I prepped about 2.5 pounds of cherries for my dehydrator in about 30 minutes. I love dried fruit. It's a sickness. This device didn't require a lot of upper arm strength, but I could be biased on that perspective since I lift weights. It just didn't seem like it needed a violent motion at all, just press and done...
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey C Porter

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: What a find! This product is truly a game changer for pitting cherries and other pitted fruit. I picked bags of cherries at a u pick farm and dreaded pitting them. Used Prime to get this pitter in 2 days. It took only a few sittings to pit every single cherry. I highly recommend this product. It does 4 cherries at a time, place equipment on a towel, place cherries with stem side up and press the top and the stones will fall into the bottom of tray. Clean out the tray frequently and watch for attached stones on pitted fruit. Again, the process goes quickly not messy at all.
customer_reviews.author: ChowOwner

customer_reviews.title: This little tool makes cherry pitting easy and fast!
customer_reviews.text: I congratulate the inventor! It's the best cherry pitter I have ever used! Note: If you are making jam, you need to run the pitted cherries through a grinder because the cherries don't stir very well if you don't.
customer_reviews.author: Stringer

customer_reviews.title: Life’s a Biwl if Pitted Cherries!
customer_reviews.text: Love the joy of eating cherries without the worry of what to do with the seed. Easy to use, you can quickly go through a bowl full of cherries removing the pit and ready to eat in mining’s
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Ginny

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product so far. Works every time, just make sure to line up the cherries properly. No mess, and easy to clean. I use it for large cherries. Easy to check the container to make sure fruit is properly pitted. Easy to use, with minimal hand pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Maggi Malone

customer_reviews.title: Cherries made easy
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy and fun to use. If you need a large quantity of cherries for baking this makes the process so much easier and faster. It is also good for pitting cherries for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Nonni B

customer_reviews.title: Can’t believe I lived this long without it!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew about this pitter a long time ago. It’s great. I wash a bunch of cherries and put them so I can just eat them at work, tubing and on the go without having to spit out the seed. It’s easy to use and clean. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I love this product when I first got it. Made it so easy to pit cherries. Today was the second time I’ve used it since I purchased and it completely fell apart. The metal pitters bent when I went to press down on the cherries and the top part of it broke off. It also cracked on the side. Disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: This Item Works ... no mess Cherry Pitting!
customer_reviews.text: I will never use anything else for pitting cherries! You can pit 4 cherries at a time, this holds either 4 large or 4 small. This is so much faster, and easier, than other "by hand" methods!! It took only minutes to pit enough cherries for a salad large enough for a group - everyone thought I must have really spent time with prep but were so happy to not have to pit the salad cherries!!
customer_reviews.author: Juniperberry72

customer_reviews.title: A+ cherry stapler!
customer_reviews.text: Does its job, in an oddly satisfying way! Not the easiest to clean but so far I have no real complaints. I've "stapled" my way through several pounds of cherries now and it hasn't failed me yet!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very effective.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pitter. I've used the hand-held single pitters before and the pit flies clear across the room. This one has a receptacle in the bottom to catch all the pits so it's much neater. Also, since I am pitting the cherries for my 2 year old, so I also make sure to count the pits each time in case of a "misfire" so she doesn't choke on one (although, i have not even once had a pit or pit fragment left behind in the cherry). The older kids also like to help and are able to operate this with supervision (the metal spikes are quite sharp). Seems durable and is holding up well under many many uses.
customer_reviews.author: Syd Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, does a great job on the cherries. Only down side - my granddaughter didn't like how loud it was when Nana smashed the pits out of her cherries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why have I never had a pitter before
customer_reviews.text: This is life changing for summer. I love cherries but hat dealing with the pit so I rarely eat them. I finally decided to get a pitter and this one is fantastic. I love that it's no effort at all to push down on it and get 4 ready to eat cherries. The best thing is the little storage drawer for the pits so you don't have them all over the counter. I'm so happy I purchased this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rodriguez F.

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy cherry pitting!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to clean. Pits 4 cherries at a time and accommodates small or large cherries (holder is built so you just rotate it to the other side if you need to change for the size of the cherries). Super easy to take apart and clean. This is my second one because I lost my first one. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: A.L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I was stuck between this one and the one that does 6 at a time. I choose this one because I thought 6 might be too much to do at once. I'm impressed by this thing. It's super easy to use and works well. Definitely glad I bought this one .
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 and 7 year old kids took turns using this for our massive cherry picking quantity this spring. It was easy for their little hands and also very easy to clean. I may purchase a second one next year so both can have their own. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M Bakie

customer_reviews.title: Plastic cracked and the piece fell out on first use.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing for lack of durability. I guess I can still do three cherries. But be sure to check the product. Out of 16 olives pitted, I found two pits in the olives.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Lisa

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases
customer_reviews.text: So happy I decided to purchase this item. Cherry picking season! & we got a bunch of cherries. Easy to use, and doesn’t take out any of the cherry meat with the seed. Would highly recommend. Now going to use to make cherry pie
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cherry Pitter
customer_reviews.text: This cherry pit remover works really well. I can do 4 cherries at a time. I have used a handheld, one at a time cherry pitter in the past and this is so much easier, defiantly worth the $$. I have a grand daughter who loves cherries, so it is a great addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Beth CochranTop Contributor: Fashion Design

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cherry season
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cherry season! I hate putting cherries and this is great for putting cherries for a small snack. It only puts 4 cherries at a time so when both my kids and I want cherries it can take some time to put enough. Over all it is a good product and works well I just wish I could put a few more at a time. It is easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: J Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Works great on cherries but not on olives
customer_reviews.text: I pitted 1 pound of green olives and this unit did not make it to the end. Base plate cracked and I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Messier

customer_reviews.title: This is for me
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this for cherries yet, but I love it for pitting olives. Super easy to use and works like a charm. The pits come out of the olives very clean. I'm giving this 5 stars because I love it so, but, I needed the strength of my husband to pit the bigger green olives as it was too hard for me to push down on them. Also, this is not for children as the pitters are very sharp. I think when cherry season is here, this will save me so much time and won't require a lot of strength as olives do.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Schauer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Cherry Pitter
customer_reviews.text: I like making clafoutis (or dutch babies, as they're often called.) I used to pit cherries with a chopstick. This contraption made my baking life a whole lot easier. If you're pitting a number of cherries, I'd highly suggest this.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Didn't remove the pits majority of the time.
customer_reviews.text: The first 2 sets of 4 cherries worked great. On the 3rd set the cherries started sticking on the posts that are supposed to push the pits out and often times completely missed the pits and I still had to cut the cherry open and remove the pit with my fingers. It is easily cleaned and stores well but it I still have to get my hands messy to remove the pits what is the point?
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is almost fun to use. Works well. I can do up to 4 at a time. I like that it looks for more efficient storage.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant device
customer_reviews.text: Freaky fun to use! I went crazy buying bags and bags of cherries. I'm running out of freezer space but have plenty of frozen cherries, smoothies for months! I actually wished I'd bought one with larger capacity now.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Item!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered at the end us last summer. Just got to use it for the first time. Great cherry pitter!
customer_reviews.author: KBrg60

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love eating cherries but I hate eating around the pits. I took a chance and purchased this product. It works great! Used it to pit cherries for a fruit salad and it was so easy! It will be a great way to prep cherries to freeze for smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Really works must have if you have kids
customer_reviews.text: Really works I like that it does pits 4 cherries at a time . I love it since my son loves to eat cherries and what an easy way to pit the cherries for him.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my Mom after she complained about stained fingers and taking too long to pit cherries with a knife. With this gadget she pitted 4 times as much in a quarter the time, without staining her fingers.
customer_reviews.author: MegaBurn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pitter
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I have been eating so many chairs since this arrived.
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: This tool is easy to use and great for de-pitting cherries quickly
customer_reviews.text: This tool is easy to use and great for de-pitting cherries quickly. If you have a few cherry trees this is a must buy! The only way it could be better is if you could load more cherries (it only de-pits 4/push).
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: And it really really works
customer_reviews.text: It really works well and to be able to do 4 cherries at once is a real time saver.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Cash

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Like how easy it is to use. Great deal for the price. Does the job
customer_reviews.author: Darkwiggles

customer_reviews.title: Pitted fresh cherries anytime!
customer_reviews.text: I love fresh cherries! When they’re in season I add them to everything. This pits 4 of them at once in no time, is super easy to clean, keeps the pits and the juice in the gadget, not your hands or the kitchen. It’s fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Joseph

customer_reviews.title: A useful but not a Must have
customer_reviews.text: It this absolutely necessary? Not really. It's another kitchen gadget that I have accumulated over the years. I only use it to make cherry clafoutis, maybe once or twice a year.
customer_reviews.author: Tristanicus

customer_reviews.title: Down in the pits
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, I think it was a waste of money. Some of my cherrys still have the pits in them. But some of them don’t
customer_reviews.author: PrimeTime

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Since this came as a incomplete item (missing the inside part that holds the cherries in place), I was unable to use it. Would have loved not having to do them one at at time. Shipping was fast....just couldn't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Even though they say you can place cherries inside the depressions in any position, I find I get a much better success rate of totally ousting the pit by placing the cherries stem depression side up. This pitter is much faster than my single one and my hands do not get stained red/purple by cherry juice any longer.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: A Pitter That is Definitely Not the Pits
customer_reviews.text: If you are preparing a recipe or fruit salad that requires a number of cherries, this is a great device. If you are just eating cherries one at a time, removing the pits in your mouth is much less trouble. It seems like a quality device and it works very well, removing the pit and leaving the cherry flesh intact.
customer_reviews.author: Morning Edition Listener

customer_reviews.title: Cherries are meaty now
customer_reviews.text: This cherry pitter has changed my life. Put this on this list of things you never knew you needed. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Michael Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised!
customer_reviews.text: I pitted a large bag of cherries in no time. Then I froze them and make delicious smoothies!
customer_reviews.author: JMZ

customer_reviews.title: First time cherry picker
customer_reviews.text: Not knowing how we were going to get all the seeds out for our pie we found this. Perfect!. With the two of us (one loading and one pushing) we got through the whole bowl in 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Great, but more delicate than it looks
customer_reviews.text: I like this cherry pitter. I've had one before this and they make pitting a bag of cherries much faster and easier. Go easy on the pushing down though, I broke the last one. The center piece that goes inside cracks.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Quick pitting of multiple cherries at once!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product! It’s the first multi-cherry pitter I’ve used, but it’s really easy to use and clean! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Milnor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! A fantastic little tool for removing pits from cherries 4 at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Walker

customer_reviews.title: It will mostly pit 4 cherries at a time. ...
customer_reviews.text: It will mostly pit 4 cherries at a time. Not all of the pits come out. You will have to fish a few out.
customer_reviews.author: Anony Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this cherry pitter
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Cherries are so much more enjoyable now. No gross pits to spit out. And, it handles 4 cherries at a time, large or small. Easy to take a part and clean. Doesn’t take up too much room. This is way better than a single cherry pitter. I would buy it again!

customer_reviews.title: Even better than advertised
customer_reviews.text: This works easily and comes apart easily to stick in the dishwasher. I'm very pleased with this little item.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Lenegir

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is my third cherry pitter of this type, not that the first two pitters had any issues. It's just that the first two pitters wore out over time. The inner plastic plate for the cherries cracked and no longer worked.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to clean, I'm just sorry I wanted so long to buy it. Fruit salad with cherries (during the season) are a daily occurrence in our home now.
customer_reviews.author: Mullill

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it. So much easier than pitting one at a time. The insert has two sizes for cherries or some small fruit. Makes eating and cooking with cherries a lot faster and easier..
customer_reviews.author: WO Rancher

customer_reviews.title: excellent for pie cherries
customer_reviews.text: My Carmine Jewel cherry trees had a bumper crop of fruit. The cherries are smaller than Bing cherries and this pitter worked great. Yeah, pits often clung to the fruit, but so what - they were easy to remove. Much, much better than removing pits individually with a knife. The unit is easy to clean. Definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little helper in the kitchen during cherry season
customer_reviews.text: Sweet little helper in the kitchen during cherry season. I've used it a lot and put lots of cherries in my freezer for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Inky

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this little cherry pitter. It's made well, easy to use, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brunner

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for small cherries
customer_reviews.text: I have a crop of small cherries. The smaller ones go right through into the pit collector. Most of the rest still have the pit attached and it has to be removed by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Sundquist

customer_reviews.title: Great tool.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cherry pitter after reading several reviews in different food blogs. I'm glad I had it - we put up about 30lbs of cherrys and that would have been awful going one cherry at a time. It does take up a lot of room - If you are like me and have a tiny kitchen - for a tool I will only use once per year when canning cherries.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Spraker

customer_reviews.title: Quick cherry pitter
customer_reviews.text: We joined a CSA and needed a way to quickly pit all of the cherries we received this summer. This cherry pitter pits 4 cherries at one time!! It is easy to clean and does the job well. The only complaint that I have is that it is a little bulky. Other than that, it has truly been a time saver!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Gess

customer_reviews.title: Good but watch for pits
customer_reviews.text: This was a very easy to use product right out of the box. I am mediately used it to depict a bag of cherries to make a Crisp. My only complaint was that it did not get out 100% of the pits. I would recommend this product to anyone with the caveat to watch for pits.
customer_reviews.author: weedman4

customer_reviews.title: I Love It !!
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic on fresh as well as frozen. Take frozen cherries out of freezer for 5 min and then you can pit them easy as pie. Haven't tried the smaller cherries yet with the other side of the tray. Super easy to clean and so far not a pit has been missed. Recommended to several friends already. This was recommended to me by a friend. Happy Pitting!
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Pitted 10 lbs. of cherries in less than 30 minutes. Then it just rinsed clean. Recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie W. Segraves

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. Unfortunately the dehydrating part of the cherry process didn't go so well. But this will work for you. Not very messy at all. Self contained. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stryker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. Holds the seeds to get rid of later. Disassembles for Easy clean up Will recommend to anyone looking to one
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Walker

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: works well. need to place cherries on side. need to make sure pits are below the cherries after using. about 75% of the time you get a clean pitting. 25% you get a hanging pit (like a hanging chad). it does 4 cherries at a time, can also do olives.
customer_reviews.author: W 6s

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Wish it had capability for doing 8 at a time, but 4 is good and better than the hand held one-at-a-time.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: So impressed with this gadget - it works perfectly! Just as described. I've used it for large cherries, the pit drops out into the tray, and the resulting cherry still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: chap1

customer_reviews.title: Must have for pitting cherries!
customer_reviews.text: We have multiple cherry trees and I always have too many cherries so I resort to pitting and freezing them. This pitter has been such a time savor! It works great on any size cherry. It's easy enough for my kids (age 7-10) to use. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K.

customer_reviews.title: Quality item that saves time
customer_reviews.text: My toddler enjoys eating cherries and before buying this it was such a pain to try and get the seeds out. This has been a time saver and it has worked incredibly well.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal P

customer_reviews.title: best pitter ever
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I've never used a single putter or any other pitter but I can't imagine them being more efficient. This helped me out 2 bags (regular sizes the supermarket sells) of cherries in less than 5 minutes. We ate twice as many cherries this year and dried some. I will be buying more of these for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Cherry pitters delight!
customer_reviews.text: This is build well. It pits 4 cherries at a time and works well. The pits are pushed from the cherries and into a holding cup. Many cherries may be pitted before emptying the cup is necessary. The cherries themselves do not get damages and are so much easier to eat without the pits.
customer_reviews.author: Prime  and Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical about this product, but I thought I would try it for my kids sake. This product is absolutely wonderful. There's is no waste at all the pit comes out easily and it doesn't smash the fruit either. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Granted I just got it and have only used a frew times but it's easy to use and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: brentwoodjen

customer_reviews.title: I also liked the fact that it does not squirt juice all ...
customer_reviews.text: I found this item to work perfectly. I also liked the fact that it does not squirt juice all over the place. As with any cherry pitter there will be one that the pit gets missed once in a great while. Easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Fishnlady

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: It works excellent! Highly recommend! Simple to use, easy clean up and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it a couple of times, but so far I love it! Works pretty well and easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Andrews

product_meta.title: Prepworks by Progressive by Progressive Cherry-It Cherry Pitter - 4 Cherries
product_meta.description:
Progressive International is your source for the widest range of functional, inventive and fun kitchen tools and great ideas put into practice. Our functional gadgets, tools, food-prep items and household products make cooking and meal preparation more efficient and fun. At Progressive, passion and creativity unite to create the right balance of form and function for today's cooks. Our in-house designers spend hours in the kitchen coming up with ways to improve on a variety of traditional tasks and tools. Established in 1973, our commitment to quality and service allows us to offer a broad selection of quality kitchenware and other household products. Prep works products from Progressive International are created by people who understand having the correct kitchen tool can make your cooking experience more enjoyable. prep works -essential items for today's cook. Prep Works from Progressive introduces a revolutionary cherry pitter where 4 cherries are quickly pitted at once. In the removable plastic insert, there is space for 4 regular cherries or 4 large cherries. Turn the cherries to the front and with one spring loaded push, 4 cherry pits are extracted. The pits are discarded in the non skid base and when finished, simply remove the insert and empty the container. This cherry pitter keeps counters and clothes free of stains and messes and makes the job of pitting cherries so fast. The spring loaded mechanism locks for compact storage. Dishwasher safe. Patent pending.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Progressive International is your source for the widest range of functional, inventive and fun kitchen tools and great ideas put into practice. Our functional gadgets, tools, food-prep items and household products make cooking and meal preparation more efficient and fun. At Progressive, passion and creativity unite to create the right balance of form and function for today's cooks. Our in-house designers spend hours in the kitchen coming up with ways to improve on a variety of traditional tasks and tools. Established in 1973, our commitment to quality and service allows us to offer a broad selection of quality kitchenware and other household products. Prep works products from Progressive International are created by people who understand having the correct kitchen tool can make your cooking experience more enjoyable. prep works -essential items for today's cook. Prep Works from Progressive introduces a revolutionary cherry pitter where 4 cherries are quickly pitted at once. In the removable plastic insert, there is space for 4 regular cherries or 4 large cherries. Turn the cherries to the front and with one spring loaded push, 4 cherry pits are extracted. The pits are discarded in the non skid base and when finished, simply remove the insert and empty the container. This cherry pitter keeps counters and clothes free of stains and messes and makes the job of pitting cherries so fast. The spring loaded mechanism locks for compact storage. Dishwasher safe. Patent pending.
feature_bullets: MESS-FREE: With our Cherry-It Pitter, you can easily pit up to four cherries at once with no stress or mess
SAFE AND DURABLE: The Non-Skid base keeps the pitter stable while the zinc prongs push pits through
DISHWASHER SAFE FOR CONVENIENT CLEANING: The pitter disassembles for easy cleaning and locks tightly for storage
PATENTED DESIGN: This product is patented
SIMPLE TO USE: Easily Press Down with little effort to quickly pit up to 4 cherries at once and the pits drop into the red base container that captures all the juice

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
